summary: Integration tests are currently disabled via environment variable in CI. This issue requests enabling them by running a server with Docker Compose as part of the continuous integration pipeline.
userImpact: Integration tests remain disabled in CI, reducing confidence in SDK functionality against real server deployments.
proposedFix: Run server with Docker Compose as part of CI pipeline to enable integration tests
resolutionDetails: Integration tests were enabled and now run as part of the CI pipeline
keyQuote: Run server with compose as part of CI.
